detail.fieldTitleHelpTextActive: If active, responsible person will be displayed.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalName: The internal name is needed for display in the administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalId: The internal ID is needed for display in the administration, imports and API connections.

detail.fieldTitleHelpTextPriority: The higher the priority, the further forward the responsible person is ranked in the display.
detail.contactNote: If filled, these fields have a higher priority than the GPSR information at the manufacturer (Catalogues > Manufacturer > GPSR Information) and at the products (Catalogues > Products > GPSR Information)
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSalesChannel: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned sales channels applies. If no sales channel is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextProductStream: OR link: The Responsible person is displayed for all products in the dynamic product groups.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextRule: OR link: The display takes place if at least one of the assigned rules is true. If no rule is added, the display always takes place.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextHeadline: If no text is entered here, the following text snippet is automatically used: "acrisGpsr.gpsrHeadlineContact"

detail.fieldTitleTabLink: The following snippet is used for the tab text: acrisGpsr.gpsrTabContact

detail.cardContactTitle: Details of the responsible person in the EU (information obligations under the GPSR Product Safety Regulation)
detail.contactHint: If the manufacturer of the product offered does not have a branch in the European Union (EU), online retailers must also provide the name, postal address and an electronic address (e-mail address or website URL) of the so-called responsible person within the meaning of the GPSR or in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2019/1020 on market surveillance and product conformity in the product offers affected by this - in addition to the manufacturer information.
